Reviews.Title: “Great Stay for Disney Travellers”
Reviews.Author: ddawger
Reviews.Content: wife stayed grand palms weeks 2011 3 children looking negative reviews share experience positive found grand palms maintained nice uncrowded pool hot tub grounds grilling dinner kids play units vary individually owned ours nice found location perfect minutes disney world parks recommend complex returning 12 nights reviewed days ago try
